subject: National Invitation Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dayton’s Chris Johnson, a 6-foot-6 swingman, had 22 points and 9 rebounds to lead the Flyers to a 68-63 victory against Mississippi in a National Invitation Tournament semifinal Tuesday at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Dayton’s Chris Johnson, a 6-foot-6 swingman, had 22 points and 9 rebounds to lead the Flyers to a 68-63 victory against Mississippi in a National Invitation Tournament semifinal Tuesday at Madison Square Garden.
